items.text: length ball angling into him, he comes forward to drive. Gets the inside half of the bat to mid-on
items.shortText: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Tasmeem: "So, the problem with Soumya continues; playing across the line, head falling over. And Liton keeps throwing his wicket away after a good start. Sigh."
items.text: yorker on target from wide of the crease around the wicket. Dug out to midwicket
items.shortText: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller length outside off, but too wide and Soumya can feast on that. Leans into the on-drive on the up to send the ball Rolls Roycing to the long-on fence
items.shortText: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.preText: mickey scan: "Here's a crazy stat: The Windies batsmen (bar Hope) scored 15 fours between them in the whole 3-match series! Talk about a one-man team." - I haven't checked that but it wouldn't surprise me
items.text: fuller ball on the stumps, comes forward to drive to long-on
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, pushed to point's left. He wants the single, but sent back
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: toss up on a length outside off, he stretches out to get to the pitch of the ball and drives it to the man on the cover fence
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: flatter and fuller on the stumps, he stays on the back foot and clips it to deep square leg
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: through the legs of the man at point flatter outside off, Tamim goes back and cuts it sweetly. The man at point let it go through his legs. Carlos Brathwaite ran round from cover and put in the dive at the fence, but his foot touched the rope while stopping the ball
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: steered to short third man
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Pranto: "There is always a mind fade for liton das after playing some effortlessly gorgeous shots.This needs to be rectified by him in his early career like Tamim Iqbal did and we can see the result."
items.text: fuller ball on the stumps, angled in. Defended towards point
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length on the stumps, Tamim takes a half step forward to block it
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good length, angling on the stumps again. Defended back
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: gets it too straight that time, and Tamim goes across to flick it to midwicket. Another fumble by the man stationed there allows a single
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, he lets it come to him and runs it down to third man
items.shortText: Paul to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: too full an don the pads, easy picking for Tamim. Spoils a good over. All he had to do is lean across and flick it past midwicket
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: Despite that wicket, Bangladesh are looking very comfortable.
items.text: what was that from Soumya? Moves across to a fuller one tossed up outside off. The ball pitched and spun past his bat. He was standing a full set of stumps outside off where it hit
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: gets the length wrong that time and allows Soumya to move across and turn it to midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, pushed to extra cover
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full toss dipping on him. Clips it but straight to the mid-on fielder
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: too short and too wide. Tamim didn't move his feet but got the timing sweet, reaching out with his bat and steering it past point and into the fence
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: flighted on the stumps, he comes forward to smother it
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText:
Interesting. Marlon Samuels to bowl. First time in the series.

Rukaiya Karim : "This should be the last chance for soumya sarkar to prove his worth... Didn't make any significant contribution in the recent past (except for tour matches)"
items.text: tossed up outside off, he comes forward and pats it to the bowler's left
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: flatter and shorter, room outside off. Easy putaway. He just stays back and cuts it to the point fence
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: strays too far down leg that time and it's a wide.
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: fuller ball on the stumps, better length. He moves across and pats it into the leg side
items.shortText: Samuels to Soumya Sarkar, no run
